name: Rescue Souls!
description:
You are walking back home after working late in your office.  The sky looks unfamiliar.

You stop vehemently as you notice supernatural changes around you.

You turn around and you see a woman covered in black. She wants you to answer all her riddles correctly. She has been waiting since the last century for  a living soul who will  free her for a peaceful afterlife.

Controls:

Hit 'ENTER' to interact with the ghost.

Hit 'A' to interact or reload the game if you die.

Hit 'A' to play again.

Also, the audio controls are intentionally made visible to enable user desired experience.
